If you're in the mood for something a bit more intense, "Snatch" is also an excellent choice! This gritty and action-packed film features an all-star cast, including Brad Pitt and Jason Statham, as they navigate the dark world of boxing promoters, bookies, and jewel thieves.

If you're looking for a thought-provoking and emotionally charged film, I highly recommend "In the Land of Blood and Honey" (2011). This powerful love story is set against the backdrop of war-torn Bosnia and features stunning performances from Branko Djuric and Jelena Jovanova. With its raw and poignant portrayal of human connection amidst conflict, this film will surely leave you moved.

If you're in the mood for a more intense and action-packed experience, "Black Hawk Down" (2001) might be just what you're looking for! This gripping war drama stars an impressive ensemble cast, including Josh Hartnett, Eric Bana, and Ewan McGregor. With its intense battle scenes and suspenseful storyline, this film will keep you on the edge of your seat.
